text:
Clooney boosts mansion security

Actor George Clooney has reportedly stepped up security to protect his mansion after his wife and lawyer Amal was sent death threats.

The couple have taken drastic measures to protect their $10.7 million mansion in Berkshire, south England, and have been advised not to travel without bodyguards. The couple now is chauffeured to local restaurants just a few metres away. — IANS
title: George Clooney boosts security of his mansion
